workplaces.about: Restored and renovated furniture, also built some furniture from scratch. I also made some boat interiors, cars and motorhomes. Also handled bookkeeping and advertising via social media
Managed the process of manufacturing aluminum ingots in different dimensions. Dirty and dangerous job with high responsibility, and I drove the forklift and high traverse.
Fabrics, accessories and furnishings. Also helps with signage and decoration in the store
Courses in Rally obedience, everyday obedience, puppy courses, jumping on a leash. Helped dog owners get better contact with their dogs and then also a funnier and more easy-going everyday

Took all orders both at checkout and drive-in. Responsible for the family days as hostess, face painting and added value for the guests. We were named Sweden's best Mcdonalds with the best sales times and high quality
Helped customers find the right drink for dinners, also took large orders for parties and events. Really fun and educational job with a lot of responsibility regarding sales and safety
